news.headline: Traders pare bets on ECB rate cuts, see 87bps this year.
ECB’s Lane: Too cautious easing could hurt the economy and dampen CPI.
ASM's MD-Staff wins 5th consecutive Best in KLAS Award for Credentialing, reinforcing its position as a trusted healthcare partner.
news.summary: A company based in Temecula, California, Applied Statistics and Management Inc. (ASM), has proudly shared that its renowned software, MD-Staff, has received the prestigious 2025 Best in KLAS Award for Credentialing. This marks the fifth consecutive year that MD-Staff has been recognized with this award, solidifying its position as a reliable ally for healthcare institutions globally. The Best in KLAS Awards are a testament to excellence in the healthcare technology industry.

news.headline: Hexure & Pulse Point collaborate to enhance Sales and Operational ecosystem; integrating FireLight sales platform with PulseEcto1 in PulseConnect system.
news.summary: In Dallas, a partnership between Hexure and Pulse Point has been announced. The collaboration aims to create a comprehensive ecosystem by combining the FireLight sales platform and PulseEcto1 with the PulseConnect system. This integration will provide a seamless experience for users and enhance the capabilities of the systems involved. The partnership is expected to benefit a wide range of individuals and businesses involved in the annuities sector.

news.headline: Virtual, Inc. expands in 2025, forming new partnerships and services for tech sector support, aiming to help organizations succeed.
news.summary: In 2025, Virtual, Inc. headquartered in Wakefield, Mass., reported significant growth through new client partnerships and enhanced service offerings aimed at bolstering support for the tech industry. The company, known for its expertise in aiding standards organizations, technology consortia, and professional societies in sectors like technology, healthcare, finance, and life sciences, is focused on enabling membership-based organizations to achieve lasting success and leave a lasting impact.

news.headline: Armanino acquires Complete Business Solutions, enhancing ERP and tech consulting expertise in first 2025 deal.
news.summary: A company based in San Ramon, California, recently announced that Armanino has acquired Complete Business Solutions, marking its first deal of 2025. This acquisition aims to enhance Armanino's ERP and business technology consulting services.

news.headline: Onapsis introduces Control Central for SAP cybersecurity with RISE with SAP transformations, part of its Secure RISE Accelerator.
news.summary: Boston-based company Onapsis has introduced a new product called Control Central, aimed at enhancing SAP application security testing and custom code security for businesses undergoing RISE with SAP transformations. Control Central is part of the Onapsis Control product line and serves as a crucial element in the Onapsis Secure RISE Accelerator program. This release marks a significant advancement in Onapsis' efforts to streamline and reduce risks associated with large-scale SAP transformations.

news.headline: Tigo has reached a milestone with 1,000 systems in their Green Glove program, focusing on TQS with support for every deployment stage.
news.summary: Tigo Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ: TYGO), based in Campbell, California, a prominent provider of advanced solar and energy software solutions, revealed that over 1,000 systems have been registered by solar installers worldwide in the Tigo Green Glove program. This initiative, created by Tigo to ensure Total Quality Solar (TQS) by offering extensive support throughout all phases of solar system installation, has gained significant traction across four continents.

news.headline: BetterComp and Compa partner to provide market data and survey benchmarks in a single platform, aiding in pricing new roles.
news.summary: In California, BetterComp, a leading market pricing platform, has collaborated with Compa, a software-driven market data provider, to combine offer-based market data and survey benchmarks in a single platform. This joint effort aims to address the lag in survey data which poses challenges for compensation teams in accurately pricing new roles and staying competitive. With Compa's offer data integrated into BetterComp's platform, enterprise clients gain valuable insights into compensation trends for high-demand positions, enhancing their ability to make informed decisions in a rapidly evolving market landscape.

news.headline: Forcura wins 2025 Best in KLAS for Patient Referral Management & Analytics with an 88.4% satisfaction score.
news.summary: In Jacksonville, Florida, Forcura, a healthcare workflow management company, has been recognized by KLAS Research as the 2025 Best in KLAS Winner for Patient Referral Management and Analytics. This marks the second year in a row that Forcura has achieved the top position in this category based on client ratings. With an impressive overall customer satisfaction score of 88.4, Forcura secured the #1 spot. Over 40 individual organizations participated in the evaluation.

news.headline: Enveda introduces ENV-294 for treating asthma, originally developed for dermatitis, and forms an advisory board.
news.summary: Enveda, based in Boulder, Colorado, has reported that their primary asset ENV-294, which was originally created for atopic dermatitis, is displaying potential in addressing asthma.

news.headline: Mercyhealth improves revenue cycle management with Arintra's AI coding: Serving 55 communities with boost in coding accuracy and efficiency.
news.summary: In Austin, Texas, Mercyhealth, a prominent health system serving 55 communities in northern Illinois and southern Wisconsin, has revolutionized its revenue cycle processes by implementing Arintra's AI-driven autonomous coding platform. Struggling with increasing revenue recognition issues, Mercyhealth integrated Arintra to enhance the precision of coding, streamline operations, and accommodate its expanding patient base. This partnership underscores Mercyhealth's dedication to providing top-notch healthcare services.

news.headline: ValGenesis and Hitachi Industry team up to transform Japan's life sciences with digital validation solutions.
news.summary: In Santa Clara, California, ValGenesis Inc., a top enterprise validation lifecycle management systems provider, has partnered with Hitachi Industry & Control Solutions, Ltd. to revolutionize Japan's life sciences sector with cutting-edge digital validation solutions. This strategic alliance combines ValGenesis’ premier digital validation platform with Hitachi Industry & Control Solutions' expertise. The collaboration is set to significantly impact Japan's life sciences industry, delivering innovative solutions.

news.headline: Effie Carlson named CEO of Watershed Health, Dr. Chip Grant as Executive Chair. Carlson joined in 2021 as advisor.
news.summary: In New Orleans, Watershed Health, a leading company in patient care coordination within healthcare, has appointed Effie Carlson as its new CEO. Carlson, a healthcare veteran, took over from founder and former CEO Dr. Chip Grant. Dr. Grant will now occupy the roles of executive chair and chief medical officer. Carlson, joining Watershed in 2021 as an advisor, demonstrated her abilities by swiftly moving up to interim chief revenue officer and chief strategy officer positions. These changes are expected to further drive Watershed Health's influence in the healthcare industry.

news.headline: Komodor had a successful year with over 50% customer growth and 5X increase in user sessions in 2024.
news.summary: In Tel Aviv and San Francisco, a recent report revealed that more than half of Komodor customers saw growth in their deployments in 2024. The main reasons cited for this expansion were automation, risk management, and cost optimization. Additionally, user sessions spiked significantly, increasing by 500% during the same period.

news.headline: Kinsta introduces "pay as you go" plans to reduce web hosting costs for customers, breaking away from rigid plans.
news.summary: In Los Angeles, Kinsta, a hosting provider specializing in managed WordPress hosting on Google Cloud Platform, is introducing a new pricing model known as "pay as you go." This innovative approach allows customers to optimize their expenses on website hosting. Typically, hosting companies impose fixed plans on customers based on the number of websites or traffic volume, leading to unnecessary expenses for website owners. With the new model, customers can tailor their hosting costs according to their specific needs, resulting in potential cost savings.

news.headline: Zbar launches "Adventure Needs Fuel" campaign to support kids' active lives with delicious ingredients. 100 characters.
news.summary: Zbar, a company based in Emeryville, California, unveiled a new brand platform on Feb. 5, 2025. The platform aims to ignite and maintain outdoor adventures for energetic children. The campaign, named "Adventure Needs Fuel," emphasizes the importance of sustaining active lifestyles with nourishing ingredients. This initiative by Zbar is geared towards promoting healthy choices for kids, with a focus on invigorating outdoor experiences.

news.headline: First Citizens Bank and Sixth Street announce launch of Sixty-First Commercial Finance for mid-sized companies.
news.summary: In a press release on February 5, 2025, First Citizens Bank and Sixth Street revealed the introduction of Sixty-First Commercial Finance. This newly established platform will be overseen by First Citizens Institutional Asset Management, LLC and aims to offer adaptable financial solutions.

news.headline: BCN adds Sales Director Jason Wagg, expanding presence in Western Region. Wagg brings channel experience to team.
news.summary: In Morristown, New Jersey on February 5, 2025, BCN, a prominent provider of innovative technology solutions, welcomed Jason Wagg as their new Sales Director. Wagg joins the team with a wealth of channel expertise, having previously held the position of Director of sales.

news.headline: Nolo's 2025 Divorce Hotlist offers insights into divorce with answers to 10 common questions. LOS ANGELES, Feb. 5, 2025.
news.summary: A recently launched resource aims to offer a detailed analysis of the present status of divorce, addressing the top 10 frequently asked questions on the subject. The initiative comes at a time when February is renowned for Valentine's Day celebrations, with millions rejoicing in love. However, the reality remains grim as not every marital union culminates in everlasting happiness. This comprehensive resource seeks to shed light on the complexities surrounding divorce, providing vital information to those navigating the challenging process.

news.headline: Nuvectis Pharma prices $13.5M public offering of 2.7M shares at $5.00/share for innovative oncology treatments.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, Nuvectis Pharma, Inc. (Nasdaq: NVCT) based in Fort Lee, NJ, a biopharmaceutical company in the clinical-stage developing precision medicines for severe unmet medical needs in oncology, disclosed the pricing details of its recent underwritten public offering. The offering involves 2,700,000 shares of common stock priced at $5.00 per share, intending to generate gross proceeds of $13.5 million for Nuvectis. Additionally, the company has provided the underwriter with a 30-day option to procure up to 405,000 more shares of common stock at the public offering price, minus underwriting discounts and commissions. The closing of the offering is anticipated to transpire on February 6, 2025, contingent on regular closing stipulations.

news.headline: Advantech (TWSE: 2395) to showcase healthcare solutions at HIMSS 2025 Global Health Conference in Las Vegas.
news.summary: Advantech, a world-renowned company specializing in embedded and IoT solutions, is hosting a showcase of innovative medical technology at the upcoming HIMSS 2025 Global Health Conference & Exhibition in Irvine, California. The event will take place on February 5, 2025. This global leader, listed as TWSE: 2395, welcomes healthcare professionals and innovators to explore the latest advancements in the industry. It promises to be a one-of-a-kind opportunity to witness the future of healthcare technology.

news.headline: Fortive announces board designees for new company Ralliant Corp, focusing on precision technologies. Separating as independent, public entity to advance innovation; includes leading brands in test and measurement, sensors, and aerospace, defense, space subsystems.
news.summary: Fortive Corporation (NYSE: FTV) in Everett, Wash., revealed plans to spin off its Precision Technologies segment as a standalone entity called Ralliant Corporation. This new company, specializing in precision technologies, will operate independently and is slated to focus on cutting-edge advancements and ensuring the security of critical applications. Ralliant will concentrate on test and measurement, specialty sensors, and aero, defense, and space subsystems. The separation is anticipated to bring about significant transformations in the sector.

news.headline: Icon Jelly Roll opens Goodnight Nashville on Broadway, with doors open since mid-January and grand opening on Feb 5, 2025.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in Nashville, Tennessee, the renowned local artist Jelly Roll debuted his new venue, Goodnight Nashville, on Broadway. The doors to the venue were first opened in mid-January, with a grand opening celebration scheduled for Thursday. This marks a significant achievement for Jelly Roll, as he transitions to a new chapter in his career.

news.headline: Oslo District Court rules in favor of SFL in legal case against Seadrill involving return of drilling rig Hercules.
news.summary: SFL Corporation Ltd., a company listed on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol SFL, recently obtained a verdict from the Oslo District Court concerning a legal dispute involving SFL's rig-owning subsidiary and entities affiliated with Seadrill Ltd. The case centered on the return of the drilling rig Hercules to SFL in December 2022.

news.headline: Allen Control Systems expands with an office at Fires Innovation Science and Technology Accelerator Innovation Park in Lawton-Fort Sill, Oklahoma.
news.summary: Precision robotics defense company Allen Control Systems (ACS) has revealed its expansion in Lawton-Fort Sill, Oklahoma, and Austin, Texas. The company has opened an office at the Fires Innovation Science and Technology Accelerator (FISTA) Innovation Park in Lawton-Fort Sill, a cutting-edge facility dedicated to backing the warfighter and enabling partners in the aerospace, defense, and associated sectors. ACS' new FISTA site will act as a central point for advancing their latest project, Bullfro.

news.headline: Fiverr launches new subscription plans for Fiverr Pro & ways for businesses to collaborate, scale in 2025 Winter Release.
news.summary: In the Winter of 2025, the popular online platform Fiverr announced significant enhancements to its premium services, marking a strategic move to cater to the higher-end market segment. The introduction of new subscription plans for Fiverr Pro will offer added benefits and value to users. Additionally, businesses will now have access to innovative tools and features, further boosting their efficiency and success on the platform. This development signals Fiverr's commitment to continued growth and improvement, with the aim of providing top-notch services to its increasing number of users.

news.headline: Jennifer Keller and Chase Scolnick of Keller Anderle Scolnick named to 2025 "Leading Commercial Litigators" list by Daily Journal.
news.summary: In Irvine, California on February 5, 2025, Keller Anderle Scolnick (KAS) revealed that Jennifer Keller and Chase Scolnick have achieved recognition as two of the standout commercial litigators in 2025. This acknowledgment came from the Los Angeles and San Francisco Daily Journals. Jennifer Keller and Chase Scolnick's inclusion on this esteemed list highlights their expertise and success in the field of commercial litigation.

news.headline: Atlas UP acquires Latch to launch an AI Chief of Staff, aiming to combat trillion-dollar productivity loss in workplace.
news.summary: In Los Angeles, Atlas UP, a military-grade AI platform utilized by the Department of Justice, Federal Bureau of Investigation, and SpaceX, has confirmed the acquisition of Latch. Latch is an AI-based change management platform pioneered by SHIFT. This acquisition aims to establish an AI-powered “Chief of Staff” by merging the two platforms. The move targets addressing the substantial yearly productivity decrement caused by ineffective work practices and operational inefficiencies. Studies indicate that 64% of human capital is squandered on unproductive work.

news.headline: dbt Labs exceeds $100M in annual revenue from Fortune 500 clients with over 5,000 using dbt Cloud.
news.summary: dbt Labs, a leader in analytics engineering, revealed that over 5,000 businesses are utilizing dbt Cloud to enhance their enterprise data management. The company recently achieved a significant milestone by surpassing $100 million in annual recurring revenue (ARR), showcasing remarkable growth from $2 million ARR. The announcement was made in Philadelphia on February 5, 2025.

news.headline: Prevent costly mower breakdowns by celebrating National Lawn Mower Maintenance Week with Toro to avoid unexpected repairs.
news.summary: In Bloomington, Minnesota on February 5, 2025, Toro launched National Lawn Mower Maintenance Week to emphasize the importance of regular upkeep for homeowners. Neglecting maintenance tasks like dull blades or overdue oil changes can lead to expensive repairs and unplanned downtime. By raising awareness about these issues, Toro aims to reduce the number of unexpected costs and repair instances faced by homeowners.

news.headline: Atlantic, Tomorrow's Office acquires BrainSell to enhance technology consulting services for SMBs. NY-based firm expands with growth enablement company.
news.summary: A New York-based company has acquired a growth enablement company to provide data-driven solutions for small and medium-sized businesses. The award-winning firm, Atlantic, Tomorrow's Office, made the announcement on February 5, 2025. This acquisition aims to leverage data to drive outcomes for businesses, marking a strategic move in the industry.

news.headline: Modular Engine Market to grow at 8.6% CAGR through 2032, includes Internal Combustion Engines, Electric Engines, and Hybrid Systems.
news.summary: In Milwaukee, Wisconsin, on February 5, 2025, a report was released detailing the Global Modular Engine Market. This market encompasses various engine types including Internal Combustion Engines (ICE), Electric Engines, Hybrid Systems, and Fuel Cell engines. The market is segmented based on power output into three categories: Low Power (below 100 kW), Medium Power (100 kW to 500 kW), and High Power (Above 500 kW). This report provides valuable insights into the industry landscape and offers a comprehensive analysis of the market's trends and projections.

news.headline: Cogent Communications to host earnings call on Feb 27, 2025 to present Q4 and full year 2024 results. Time: 8:30 am ET.
news.summary: On February 27, 2025, Cogent Communications Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: CCOI) is scheduled to conduct a conference call at 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time to report its operational performance for the fourth quarter and full year of 2024. The call will provide an opportunity for stakeholders to pose questions to the company.

news.headline: Korea Zinc subsidiary thwarts hostile takeover by acquiring Young Poong shares, ensuring stable growth in Australia. #KRX:010130
news.summary: In Seoul, South Korea, Sun Metals Corporation (SMC), a subsidiary of Korea Zinc (KRX: 010130), has successfully prevented a hostile takeover of its parent company by acquiring shares of Young Poong. This strategic move has safeguarded the business operations in Australia and secured a sustainable path for future growth. SMC addressed and dismissed allegations surrounding the acquisition, asserting that the claims lack legal validity. The acquisition has positioned SMC and Korea Zinc for continued success in the market.

news.headline: PETE acquires PlutoLMS, a global LMS, to expand workforce training globally, solidifying market presence.
news.summary: In Orlando, Florida on February 5, 2025, PETE, a prominent provider of AI-driven workforce training solutions, unveiled its acquisition of PlutoLMS, a corporate Learning Management System headquartered in Cape Town, South Africa. This strategic move allows PETE to enhance its market presence and expedite its growth in the industry.

news.headline: BiOWiSH Technologies appoints Bill Diederich as CEO, replacing former Chief Innovation Officer. Over 15 years with company and 30 years in agriculture.
news.summary: CINCINNATI--BiOWiSH Technologies, Inc., a leading global biotechnology solutions provider, has appointed Bill Diederich as the new Chief Executive Officer (CEO), with immediate effect. Diederich, a 15-year veteran of the company, successfully led the development and launch of BiOWiSH’s agronomy program. Formerly the Chief Innovation Officer, his promotion comes as a testament to his extensive expertise in the agricultural sector, spanning nearly three decades.

news.headline: Muff Liquor Co. partners with Lucas Bols USA to release 3 Irish spirits in US market, honoring heritage and craft.
news.summary: An acclaimed Irish spirits company has launched its products in the U.S. market, introducing three distinct expressions that celebrate heritage, quality, and skill. The Muff Liquor Company, hailing from the village of Muff in Co..., has gained recognition for its exceptional spirits. The company's venture into the U.S. market on February 5, 2025, signifies its commitment to expanding its reach. With a focus on tradition and craft, the company is poised to make an impact in the competitive spirits industry.

news.headline: Limitless Space Institute and Dusk Observatories team up to offer virtual telescope access to classrooms globally.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in Houston, the Limitless Space Institute (LSI) revealed an exciting collaboration with Dusk Observatories to offer unparalleled virtual access to advanced telescopes for educational purposes. This partnership aims to inspire and educate students, providing them with unique opportunities to explore the cosmos.

news.headline: ECB's Lane: New upside risks to inflation could emerge.
ECB’s Lane: A middle path is appropriate for policy.
ECB's Lane: Calibration of monetary policy cannot be summarised by a neutral rate
Edible Garden's Brisea Nanobubble project boosts yield by 55% and cuts harvest time by 30%, reshaping sustainable agriculture.
news.summary: A new nanobubble technology has shown the potential to boost crop yield by 55% and shorten the harvest cycle by 30%, promising significant benefits for sustainable agriculture. This technology is set to revolutionize the industry by significantly increasing productivity. These remarkable improvements could lead to notable economic and environmental advantages for farmers, helping them achieve higher yields in a shorter time frame.

news.headline: Counterpart Health, an AI platform, signs multi-year deal with Southern Illinois Healthcare, the largest health system, in Feb 2025.
news.summary: On Feb. 05, 2025, Counterpart Health, Inc. revealed a strategic multi-year partnership with Southern Illinois Healthcare (SIH), the biggest health system in Southern Illinois. Counterpart, an AI-driven physician enablement platform, operates under Clover Health Investments, Corp. (Nasdaq: CLOV). Established as a subsidiary, Counterpart's collaboration with SIH, a prominent healthcare provider in the region, signifies a significant move in the industry.

news.headline: GCM Grosvenor hires Joe Metzger as Managing Director in Insurance Solutions Group to meet industry's needs.
news.summary: In Chicago on February 5, 2025, GCM Grosvenor revealed that Joe Metzger has been appointed as a Managing Director within its Insurance Solutions Group. GCM Grosvenor, a prominent global alternative asset management solutions provider listed on Nasdaq under GCMG, is enhancing its offerings to cater to the distinctive investment requirements of the insurance sector.

news.headline: E Ink to debut 75” E Ink Kaleido™ 3 Outdoor large color signage at Integrated Systems Europe 2025 in Barcelona.
news.summary: At an upcoming event in Barcelona, E Ink is set to unveil their latest and largest color signage display yet - the 75” E Ink Kaleido™ 3 Outdoor. This new offering will mark a significant advancement in outdoor digital signage technology, boasting vibrant colors and a large display size to captivate audiences. The unveiling of this innovative product is expected to attract a lot of attention at the event, showcasing E Ink's commitment to pushing the boundaries of digital display solutions.

news.headline: Global Technologies, Ltd. (GTLL) reports 29% growth in shareholder equity, reaching $1,975,827 by Dec 31, 2024.
news.summary: Headquartered in Parsippany, New Jersey, Global Technologies, LTD (OTC: GTLL) has reported a significant 29% rise in shareholder equity in the initial half of the fiscal year. By December 31, 2024, the shareholder equity surged to $1,975,827 from $1,532,471 recorded on June 30, 2024. This growth reflects the company's commitment to driving innovation and sustainable development throughout the technology and service sectors.

news.headline: LegalZoom (Nasdaq: LZ) will report Q4 and full year 2024 financial results on Feb 26, 2025, after market close.
news.summary: In Mountain View, California, on February 5, 2025, LegalZoom.com, Inc. (Nasdaq: LZ) revealed plans to disclose its financial performance for the fourth quarter and full year concluding on December 31, 2024. This announcement is scheduled to be made on Wednesday, February 26, 2025, following the market closure.

news.headline: Lleida.net CEO plans European & Latin American expansion and subsidiary restructuring to assess underperforming units.
news.summary: On February 5th in Madrid, Lleida.net CEO Sisco Sapena revealed plans to evaluate the restructuring of certain subsidiaries that lack a clear future in the near term during an investor meeting. This decision comes as the company considers streamlining operations. The specific subsidiaries under review were not disclosed, but this move signifies a strategic maneuver to ensure efficiency and sustainability. Sisco Sapena emphasized this action as part of the company's commitment to adapt and thrive in the dynamic business landscape.

news.headline: Progress acknowledged in Gartner Magic Quadrant for Digital Experience Platforms for 4th year in a row.
news.summary: For the fourth year in a row, significant advancements in the field of Digital Experience Platforms have been acknowledged in the latest Gartner Magic Quadrant report. The report highlights the notable progress made by industry leaders, showcasing their continued dominance in the market. This recognition serves as a testament to the innovation and dedication of companies in this sector to enhance digital experiences. The steady growth in this space is underscored by the consistent improvements demonstrated by key players, reflecting the ever-evolving nature of the industry. This recognition reaffirms the importance of Digital Experience Platforms and their critical role in shaping the digital landscape.
